components.name: HTTP Source
components.description: A source which accepts Flume Events by HTTP POST and GET. GET should be used for experimentation only. HTTP requests are converted into flume events by a pluggable “handler” which must implement the HTTPSourceHandler interface. This handler takes a HttpServletRequest and returns a list of flume events. All events handled from one Http request are committed to the channel in one transaction, thus allowing for increased efficiency on channels like the file channel. If the handler throws an exception, this source will return a HTTP status of 400. If the channel is full, or the source is unable to append events to the channel, the source will return a HTTP 503 - Temporarily unavailable status.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description: The hostname or IP address to listen on

handler.name: Handler
handler.description: The FQCN of the handler class.

enableSSL.name: Enable SSL
enableSSL.description: Set the property true, to enable SSL. HTTP Source does not support SSLv3.

excludeProtocols.name: Exclude protocols
excludeProtocols.description: Space-separated list of SSL/TLS protocols to exclude. SSLv3 is always excluded.

keystore.name: Key store
keystore.description: Location of the keystore includng keystore file name
